usergroup.name: CocoaHeads Frankfurt
usergroup.description: CocoaHeads is a group devoted to discussion of Apple Computer's Cocoa Framework for programming on MacOS X (including the iPhone). During monthly meetings, members present on their projects and offer tutorials on various programming topics. We meet each 1st Monday. We usually have one presentation and some discussions and then go for beers.

mailinglist.label: Google Group
mailinglist.description: We use this Google group to organize the meetings.
